translation.ko: 이 돈은 내가 가질 거야 내 돈이라고, 개새끼들아!

translation.en: -Put a bullet right in your forehead. -[shakily] No.
-Down, Stein! -[screams]
-What the fuck? -Sorry!
We all make mistakes!
[Coffee] Okay, here's the plan.
Orlando and I, we run out guns blazing. Create a diversion.

translation.en: But I promise, we're all going to make it out of here alive.
translation.ko: 약속할게 모두 다 살아서 나갈 거야

translation.en: Most of us. At least half of us are going to make it out of here alive.
translation.ko: 대부분은 적어도 절반은 반드시 살아서 나갈 거야

translation.ko: - 그딴 말을 왜 해요? - 그놈의 절반이 누군데?

translation.en: You're right. It's not a good plan.
I gotta say, man, if you die, I’d be pretty pissed.
translation.ko: 솔직히 말할게요 아저씨가 죽으면 화날 거예요

translation.en: I love you, too.
I ain't saying all that now.
Yeah, but I get it.
-Aren't you trained for shit like this? -Let's do this.
translation.ko: - 이런 거 훈련하지 않았어? - 그럼 해 보자

translation.en: -[Coffee in slow motion] Shit! -[Kareem in slow motion] Coffee!
[Orlando] Come on, let's go!
-[Vanessa] Don't shoot us! -[Police] Hold your fire!
[Watts] I walk through the valley of the shadow of death!
Coffee's still in there!
translation.ko: - 커피가 아직 안에 있어요 - 곧 폭발할 거야!

translation.en: That shit's gonna blow! Get 'em back now!
translation.ko: - 커피가 아직 안에 있어요 - 곧 폭발할 거야! 뒤쪽으로 데려가!

translation.en: Fuck, it's not detaching!
We about to make it out this mother fucker.
translation.ko: 믿어지지 않지만 조금만 더 가면 돼

translation.en: If I die, you motherfuckers are coming with me!
[Watts] Coffee, I'm gonna fucking kill you!
[Coffee] Get out of here!
-[Orlando] Oh, shit! -Son of a... Fuck!
I'm sorry.
I'm so sorry.
-You're bullshitting! -I'm not. This got so out of hand!
translation.ko: - 개수작인 거 알아 - 아냐, 이럴 생각은 없었어

translation.en: [crying] Please, help me.
I’m at the end of my fucking rope, man. I don’t know how this happened!
translation.ko: 나 완전 막장이잖아 어떻게 된 건지도 모르겠어

translation.en: Listen, you made some horrible choices.
translation.ko: 나쁜 선택을 몇 번 한 거야

translation.en: But it's not too late.The department has great mental health resources.
translation.ko: 하지만 아직 안 늦었어 우리 정신 건강 시설 좋잖아

translation.en: You might do a little time, but we can turn your life around.
translation.ko: 형은 좀 살아야겠지만 새 삶을 시작할 수도 있어

translation.en: I am fucking with you!
translation.ko: 나 지금... 너 갖고 노는 거야!

translation.en: -Fuck! I knew it. -[Watts] You idiot.
You had no idea.
Coffee!
This is what happens when you fuck with me, you mother--
translation.ko: 날 엿 먹이면 이렇게 되는 거야 이 등신...

translation.en: Eat it, Watts!
[Watts] No!
[Watts] No!
No!
Come on, man. Get in there and help him.
The fire department will be here real soon, guys,
and I'm sure everything will work out just fine.
Ah, shit. Voilà.
If you need a good grief counselor, I know a guy.
Look!
-Coffee! -James!
-[Vanessa] He's on fire! -[Kareem] Coffee!
No, move. Move!
James, I'm so glad you're okay. Oh my God.
Are you crying?
Who's soft now, huh?
-Are you all right? -No!
-[Vanessa] Somebody help! -[officer] Come on.
Officer Coffee will corroborate your role as an informant?
translation.ko: 그쪽이 정보원이란 거 커피 경관이 확인해 줄까요?

translation.en: Hell yeah, he'll corroborate. The fucking kid'll tell you, too!
translation.ko: 네, 확인해 줄 거예요 저 꼬맹이한테 물어봐도 돼요

translation.en: All that's behind me, man, Imma be a dentist.
translation.ko: 다 지난 일이죠 치과 의사가 될 거예요

translation.en: I decided. Just recently.
Imma be a dentist. I'm like the mold in the whole situation.
translation.ko: 치과 의사가 될 거예요 제가 전체적 상황의 틀이죠

translation.en: So, Deb, are you a Gary Sinise fan?
You think he'll be okay?
Yeah, I think he'll be just fine.
What about us?
What would you say if I asked you to marry me?
Let's see how this all heals up first.
[Coffee cringes] Ow, don't make me laugh!
It causes more chunks to fall off.
Have you seen yourself yet?
Oh, it's gonna be fine. I'll just put some aloe on it.
translation.ko: 괜찮을 거야 알로에 좀 바르면 돼

translation.en: Coffee, I want those hands where I can see them.
translation.ko: 커피! 손은 내가 볼 수 있는 데 둬요

translation.en: Damn. How is this more gross than when I caught y'all boning?
translation.ko: 젠장 이게 왜 섹스보다 더 징그럽게 보이지?

translation.en: Hey! We got a live one here!
No!
Coffee, I'm gonna kill--
Coffee.
Stay away from my family, bitch!
That was hot.
[laughs] Now that is what the fuck I'm talking about.
Hey! Language.
You just shot...
Yes, ma'am.
Don’t think I don’t see the look y'all are giving each other.
translation.ko: 둘이 눈빛 주고받는 거 내가 못 볼 거라 생각 마

translation.en: I see everything.
[scoffs] Coffee, you have got your hands full.
Yeah. So does this mean the deal’s over? You gonna let me see your mom,
translation.ko: 그럼 거래는 끝난 거지? 네 엄마 만나게 해 줄 거야?

translation.en: and you're definitely not gonna try to have me murdered?
translation.ko: 살인 사주 같은 거 안 하고?

translation.en: [sighs] Just don't give me a fucking reason to.
